resources.string:
Career Validity - Terms of Service

Last Updated: Dec, 22, 2023

Welcome to Career Validity! These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of the Career Validity application and related services (collectively referred to as the "App"). By accessing or using the App, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree with these Terms, please do not use the App.
By using the Career Validity App, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms. These Terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and Career Validity.
Career Validity is an application designed to predict and validate the authenticity of job opportunities. The App offers features to detect job vacancies and provides articles related to jobs and careers for informational purposes.

By using the App, you agree to:

a. Use the App for lawful purposes only and comply with all applicable laws and regulations.
b. Respect the intellectual property rights of Career Validity and third parties.
c. Provide accurate and complete information during the registration process.
d. Not engage in any activity that may interfere with or disrupt the functionality of the App.

Your use of the App is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which can be found here. Please review the Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and disclose your information.
To access certain features of the App, you may be required to register for an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account. Career Validity reserves the right to suspend or terminate your account if it believes that your account information is inaccurate or if you violate these Terms.
The App is provided "as is" and "as available" without any warranties, express or implied. Career Validity does not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of any content or information provided by the App.
Career Validity and its affiliates shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly.
Career Validity reserves the right to modify or update these Terms at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting. Continued use of the App after such changes constitutes acceptance of the revised Terms.
Career Validity reserves the right to terminate, suspend, or restrict your access to the App for any reason, without notice.
If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms, please contact us at carvalindo23@email.com.


By using the Career Validity App, you agree to these Terms of Service. Thank you for using Career Validity!
